projects.name: Jamming
projects.description: This project is built with the React front-end framework and utilizes the Spotify API to search for songs and create playlists. A user can search for songs and build a playlist that can be added to their Spotify account.

projects.name: Strange Attractor Application
projects.description: This project utilizes python and tkinter as a GUI. The project randomizes parameters into quadratic equations to create visualy striking strange attractor graphs.
This project utilizes java and swing as a GUI. The game utilizes arrays and queues to handle functionality and scoring logic.
